ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
scores is a Python package containing mathematical functions for the verification, evaluation
and optimisation of forecasts, predictions or models. It supports labelled n-dimensional
(multidimensional) data, which is used in many scientific fields and in machine learning. At
present, scores primarily supports the geoscience communities; in particular, the meteorological,
climatological and oceanographic communities.
about.summary: A Python package for verifying and evaluating models and predictions with xarray

about.description:
scores is a Python package containing mathematical functions for the verification, evaluation
and optimisation of forecasts, predictions or models. It supports labelled n-dimensional
(multidimensional) data, which is used in many scientific fields and in machine learning. At
present, scores primarily supports the geoscience communities; in particular, the meteorological,
climatological and oceanographic communities.
about.summary: A Python package for verifying and evaluating models and predictions with xarray

name: scores
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "scores" %}
{% set version = "2.4.0" %}
{% set python_min = "3.10" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/scores-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3edfeb2f077152b08351e19ea83f1cae6b4237e3abe495dcd3adef1ddeb27661

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - hatchling
    - tomlkit
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - xarray >=2024.1
    - pandas >=2.0,<3.dev0
    - scipy >=1.13,<2.dev0
    - bottleneck >=1.3,<2.dev0

test:
  imports:
    - scores
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip

about:
  summary: A Python package for verifying and evaluating models and predictions with xarray
  description: |
    scores is a Python package containing mathematical functions for the verification, evaluation
    and optimisation of forecasts, predictions or models. It supports labelled n-dimensional
    (multidimensional) data, which is used in many scientific fields and in machine learning. At
    present, scores primarily supports the geoscience communities; in particular, the meteorological,
    climatological and oceanographic communities.  
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  doc_url: https://scores.readthedocs.io/
  home: https://github.com/nci/scores

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - tennlee
